verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> very early in the <S%G3722>morning,<s%> he <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> sat <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
they <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G2638>found<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> in <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> in the very <S%G1888>act.<s%>

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3985>testing<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2192>have<s%> something to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1161>of.<s%> But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2955>stooped<s%> <S%G2736>down,<s%> and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground<s%> <S%G1147>with<s%> his <S%G1147>finger.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G1961>continued<s%> <S%G2065>asking<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he looked <S%G352>up<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "He who is without <S%G361>sin<s%> among <S%G5216>you,<s%> let <S%G906>him<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>"

<S%G1161>They,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> being <S%G1651>convicted<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> their <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4245>oldest,<s%> even <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2078>last.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> where she <S%G2476>was,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>middle.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%> He who <S%G190>follows<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G4043>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> will <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2579>"Even<s%> if <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>from,<s%> and <S%G4226>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>from,<s%> or <S%G4226>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1049>treasury,<s%> as he <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple.<s%> <S%G2532>Yet<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4084>arrested<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>had<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> am going <S%G5217>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%> <S%G3699>Where<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3756>can't<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>"

I <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> will <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G599>he,<s%> you will die <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>"

<S%G3004>They<s%> said <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4771>you?<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>"Just<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>what<s%> I have been <S%G2980>saying<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%>

I <S%G2192>have<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%> <S%G235>However<s%> he who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true;<s%> and the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> from <S%G846>him,<s%> these <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3752>"When<s%> you have lifted <S%G5312>up<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> you will <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2532>he,<s%> and I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> I <S%G2980>say<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%> The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G863><s%> <S%G3756>hasn't<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the things that are <S%G701>pleasing<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "We <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>'s <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G4455>never<s%> <S%G1398>been<s%> in <S%G1398>bondage<s%> to <S%G3762>anyone.<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> do <S%G3754>you<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1096><s%>" 'You will be made <S%G1658>free?<s%>' "

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2980>say<s%> the <S%G3708>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> also <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G3767>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%>"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2257>"Our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>'s <S%G5043>children,<s%> you would <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G302>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> you <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4160>didn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> do <S%G5124>this.<s%>

<S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%>" <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>They<s%> said to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2249>"We<s%> <S%G1080>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality.<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

Therefore <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> you would <S%G25%G99999>love<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> came <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> For <S%G1063%G99999>I<s%> <S%G3761>haven't<s%> come <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

<S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2309>desires<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%> <S%G1565>He<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2476>a<s%> <S%G443>murderer<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> on his <S%G2398>own;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%>

He who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1223>For<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3568>"Now<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>demon.<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437><s%> " 'If a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> he <S%G1089>will<s%> <S%G1519>never<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death.<s%>' "

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they took <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2928>hidden,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> having <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3319>midst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> passed <S%G3855>by.<s%>
